column2: "Nyia ɔtse Ɔsorsornyi no no huntsabea no
column4: nyia ɔtse Otumfo no no nwinwin no ase no."

column3: Ɔwo nye mo guandɔbea na m'akoban; Me Nyankopɔn a wo mu na medze mo werɛ hyɛ."

column2: "Ampaara ɔno na obeyi wo efi efirsuafo efir mu
column3: Na ɔsor yarba a ɔsɛɛ no mu
column6: Na ne ntsaban ase na iboguan akɔdɔ: No nokwar yɛ kyɛm na nkataenyim."

column2: "Ɔwo irunnsuro wɔ anadwe adze a ɔyɛ hu ntsi
column3: Eso wɔ egyen menaba a otu ewiaber ntsi;"

column2: "Wɔ ɔsor yarba a ɔnenam sum mu
column3: Anaa ɔsɛɛ a ɔsɛɛ wigyinae ntsi."
Na ɔpedu atotɔ wɔ w'enyimfa; Naaso orunndu wo nkyɛn."
edze EWURADZE ayɛ wo guandɔbew! Nyew edze Ɔsorsornyi no ayɛ wo tsenabew;"
Nkyii so ɔyarbɔn bi remmbɛn w'asesee."

column2: "Osiandɛ ɔbɛhyɛ n'abɔfoe mbra wɔ wo ho
column3: Dɛ wɔnhwɛ wo do wɔ w'akwan nyinara mu."

column2: "Ɔwo ebɛnantsew gyata na ehurutsia do: Gyataburwa na abowatsena na ɔwo ibetsiatsia hɔn do."
"Nyia no dɔ tsim mo do no
column3: Mebɛgye no: Medze no besi yie
column4: osiandɛ oehu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE."

column3: na mebɛgye no do; Menye no bɛtsena ɔfona mu: Mibeyi no
